speaker: Rex
content: I can't believe you tried to kill me.

speaker: Bree
content: Yes, well, I feel bad about that. I told you, Mrs. Huber came over and I got distracted. It was a mistake.
mark: I feel bad about that. 我对此感到很难过
distract v. 使分心，使转移注意力 distracted adj. 注意力分散的，心烦意乱的

speaker: Rex
content: Since when do you make mistakes?
mark: since when 从什么时候开始

speaker: Bree
mark: what's that supposed to mean 你这话到底什么意思？那是什么意思 suppose v.推断，料想，猜想；假设，假定，设想；预期，需要 be supposed to应该

speaker: Rex
content: It means I'm sick of you being so damn perfect all the time.
mark: sick of 厌倦 sick of sb doing sth（对某人做某事感到厌烦） Sick of sth（对某事感到厌烦）
damn 该死，见鬼
all the time 一直，始终

speaker: Rex
content: I'm sick of the bizarre way your hair doesn't move.
mark: bizarre adj.奇异的，古怪的

speaker: Rex
content: I'm sick of you making our bed in the morning before I've even used the bathroom.
mark: make bed 整理床铺
在做 B 这件事之前，A 这件事必须先发生（或者还没发生）时，通常使用现在完成时来强调 A 这件事的完成状态
use the bathroom. 上厕所

speaker: Rex
content: You're the plastic suburban housewife with her pearls and spatula, who says things like "we owe the Henderson's a dinner."
mark: You're the plastic suburban housewife with her pearls and spatula, who says things like "we owe the Henderson's a dinner." 你就像一个人造的乡村主妇，带着珍珠拿着抹刀，然后说着：“我们欠亨德森一家一顿饭。”
Henderson's 当我们提到一家人时，通常会在姓氏后面加上 's 来表示所有格。
plastic n.塑料；信用卡；adj.塑料制的；人造的，不自然的；可塑的
suburban adj.郊区的，城郊的；平淡乏味的，乡气的，平庸的
pearl n.珍珠
spatula n.（调和、涂抹用）抹刀，小铲
owe v.欠（钱），负账；应该做，应给予；欠（人情）；归因于，归功于

speaker: Rex
content: Where's the woman I fell in love with. Who used to burn the toast and drink milk out of the carton? and laugh?
mark: burn the toast 把吐司烤焦 toast n.烤面包片，吐司；干杯，祝酒，敬酒
carton n.硬纸盒，塑料盒，特指装牛奶、果汁那种比较薄的盒子 Drink milk out of the carton. cardboard n. 硬纸板，纸板箱

speaker: Rex
content: I need her, not this cold, perfect thing you've become.

speaker: Alice
content: Bree sobbed quietly in the restroom for five minutes, but her husband never knew.
mark: sob v. 啜泣，抽噎；哭诉

speaker: Alice
content: Because when Bree finally emerged, she was perfect.
